tool_description:
JailBase provides mugshots and arrest information to the public for free. 

We have an easy to use web api so your website or application can access our extensive county jail inmate data. Using the API, you can search for arrested and booked individuals in county jails. 

The web service uses a REST interface to make calls and returns results in JSON (JSONP is also supported). Calls to the webservice do not require a developer key, however they are rate limited (see terms of use). If you have questions or comments, please contact us. 

Use our api to search for county jail mugshots today.
name: JailBase
title: JailBase

api_list.name: Recent

required_parameters.name: source_id
required_parameters.description: The id of a specific organization to search (use 'az-mcso' for test).  Full list at http://www.jailbase.com/api/#sources_list

optional_parameters.name: page
optional_parameters.description: The page number to return.  Only 10 records are returned per page.  See total_records, current_page and next_page values in the results.

optional_parameters.name: json_callback
optional_parameters.description: If using JSONP, specify the function name here.

api_list.name: Search

required_parameters.name: source_id
required_parameters.description: The id of a specific organization to search.  Full list at http://www.jailbase.com/api/#sources_list

required_parameters.name: last_name
required_parameters.description: The last name to search for, partial names accepted

optional_parameters.name: first_name
optional_parameters.description: The first name to search for, partial names accepted

optional_parameters.name: page
optional_parameters.description: The page number to return. Only 10 records are returned per page. See total_records, current_page and next_page values in the results. Default: 1.

optional_parameters.name: json_callback
optional_parameters.description: If using JSONP, specify the function name here

api_list.name: Sources
api_list.description: All the organizations we collect information for

optional_parameters.name: json_callback
optional_parameters.description: If using JSONP, specify the function name here.
